title: Weird Bird Beaks
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 130 words, Level H (Grade 1), Lexile 400L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     N and R		                 
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     N and R		                 
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     N and R
description: Have you ever wondered why some birds have such weird beaks? Have you wondered how they can eat or fly with such oddly shaped beaks? Weird Bird Beaks provides some insight. Book and lesson also available at Levels N and R.
meta: beak, horn, long, shaped, use, very, weird
Use the reading strategy of summarizing to understand nonfiction text
Compare and Contrast : Identify details to compare and contrast beaks
Manipulate Medial Sounds : Manipulate medial sounds
Vowel Digraphs : Read words with long /e/ digraphs
Adjectives : Identify adjectives and the nouns they describe

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
